item.description:
Carlisle Old Home Day Festivities, http://www.carlisleohd.org/

Meet at 4:30pm for a picnic supper, and to reserve blanket space.

5:30 pm 'til ~ 8:30 Twilight Music Cavalcade

Featuring  Band of Brothers; Blackstone Valley Bluegrass, Larry Unger and Eden MacAdam

http://www.blackstonevalleybluegrass.com/ 

5:30 - 'til ? Ice Cream Social with the Carlisle Girl Scouts scooping up chocolate and strawberry ice cream sundaes, for JUST $2.00

Popcorn and Music FREE!

and you can fly high over Carlisle with the Re-Max balloon offerring tethered hot air balloon rides.

NOTE - Spalding Field is located on Church Street (a one-way street) between the Carlisle Public School and Green Cemetery.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: FREE Twilight Music Cavalcade
